鵃字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵃； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1489第08
【唐韻】【集韻】?張流切，音輈。【說文】鵃，鶻鵃也。似山鵲而小。一名鶌鳩。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶌鳩，鶻鵃。【本草】其鳴云：鉤輈格磔，自呼也。又【玉篇】止遙切【集韻】之遙切，?音昭。又【廣韻】【集韻】?陟交切，音啁。義?同。又【玉篇】丁交切【集韻】丁聊切，?音鵰。義同。又【集韻】丁了切，音鳥。鵃䑠，船長貌。䑠字原刻从了从鳥。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋鳥】鶌鳩，鶻鳩。〕　謹照原文鶻鳩改鶻鵃。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵃; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1489 Page 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zhang Liuqie, with different sounds. 【Said Wen】鵃，鹘鵃也. Small like a magpie. A chido. 【Erya·Shiniao】鶌-dove, 鹘鵃. [Materia Medica] Qi Mingyun: Gouqige Zeng, call himself. Also [Jade Chapter] Cut away from the distance [Jiyun],? Yin Zhao. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zhi intersected, sounded. Righteous? Same. Also [Jade articles] Ding Jiaoqie [Jiyun] Ding talks and cuts, sound carving. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] Ding cut, sound bird. Feng Yu, the captain's appearance. The word "呠" was originally engraved from the bird. Textual research: [【Erya·Shiniao】鶌-dove, 鹘-dove. 〕 　I would like to change the falcon according to the original.
